headline.main: Mali Arrests Suspect in Hotel and Restaurant Attacks

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The man, Fawaz Ould Ahmed, is suspected of being part of a group linked to Al Qaeda that struck civilians at locations frequented by Westerners.
lead_paragraph: The man, Fawaz Ould Ahmed, is suspected of being part of a group linked to Al Qaeda that struck civilians at locations frequented by Westerners.
